text: baaz log aise bhi hai jo Allah ke shareek auro ko tehra kar un se aisi muhabbath rakhte hai, jaisi muhabbath Allah se honi chahiye, aur imaan waale Allah ki muhabbath mein bahuth saqth hote hai, kaash ke mushrik log jaante jab ke Allah ke azaab ko dekh kar (jaan lenge) ke tamaam taqaath Allah hee ko hai aur Allah taâ€™ala saqth azaab dene wala hai (to hargiz shirk na karte)
